type.description: This field describes the view to associate this category with. Valid options are brandFamily, regulars, suggestedItems, gifts, groupedByCountry, packaging, alphabetical, productOrdering, flavor

sortOrder.description: The order in which this category should appear relative to others. Categories are sorted from lowest sortOrder to highest.

iconImageURL.description: The primary image associated with this category.

backgroundImageURL.description: The background image associated with this category.

brands.description: The brands associated with this category. Note that categories are always associated with a list of brands or a list of items, never both.

alcoholContent.description: The percentage of alchol in the brand's products.

family.description: An optional grouping for similar brands, for instance, Bud Light Lime and Bud Light may share a brand family.

foodPairing.description: Suggested foods to consume along with the brand.

marketingCopy.description: Marketing copy for the brand displayed in Brand Details.

romanceCopy.description: A succinct description of the brand displayed in Product Ordering.

servingTemperature.description: The ideal condition to serve the brand's products.

style.description: The beer style of the brand, for instance, Indian Pale Ale.

trueBrewer.description: The actual brewer of the beer.

imageURL.description: A url or path to a local file.
A path to the glassware's image.

description.description: A show description of the glassware.

name.description: A name for the glassware, e.g. Pint Glass.

brandIDs.description: An array identifying brands associated with the glassware

items.description: The items associated with this category. Note that categories are always associated with a list of brands or a list of items, never both.

brandName.description: The name of the item's parent brand.

name.description: A name for the item displayable to the user.

unitPrice.description: The top-line price for the item.

itemCount.description: The number of bottles/cans/kegs in a single container. If a package contains 2 6-packs, 6.

itemSize.description: The volume of a single keg, bottle, or can in a package.

returnable.description: Marks whether the package may be returned or not.

unitCount.description: The number of containers in a package. If a package contains 2 6-packs, 2.
